q: Which is the odd one out: Curd, Butter, Oil, Cheese, Cream?
desc: All except oil are milk products; oil is not derived from milk.

q: Which is the odd one out: Rose, Lotus, Marigold, Lily, Tulip?
desc: All are land flowers except lotus, which is an aquatic flower.

q: Which is the odd one out: Pistol, Sword, Gun, Rifle, Cannon?
desc: All except sword are firearms; sword is a bladed weapon.

q: Which is the odd one out: Cathedral, Mosque, Church, Monastery, Temple?
desc: All except monastery are places of worship; monastery is a place where monks live.

q: Which is the odd one out: Book, Paper, Pencil, Pen, Sharpener?
desc: All except book are stationery items used for writing; book is for reading.

q: Which is the odd one out: Geometry, Algebra, Trigonometry, Mathematics, Arithmetic?
desc: All except mathematics are branches of mathematics.

q: Which is the odd one out: Poland, Greece, Spain, Italy, Korea?
desc: All except Korea are European countries; Korea is in Asia.

q: Which is the odd one out: Copper, Tin, Brass, Platinum, Zinc?
desc: All except brass are metals; brass is an alloy.

q: Which is the odd one out: Carrot, Potato, Tomato, Ginger, Beetroot?
desc: All except tomato grow underground; tomato grows above ground.

q: Which is the odd one out: Calf, Cub, Piglet, Duckling, Hireling?
desc: All except hireling are young ones of animals; hireling is a person employed for wages.

q: Which is the odd one out: Gangtok, Singhbhum, Hyderabad, Chennai, Bhubaneshwar?
desc: All except Singhbhum are capitals of states in India; Singhbhum is a district.

q: Which is the odd one out: Chameleon, Crocodile, Alligator, Locust, Salamandar?
desc: All except locust are reptiles; locust is an insect.

q: Which is the odd one out: Kiwi, Eagle, Emu, Penguin, Ostrich?
desc: All except eagle are flightless birds; eagle can fly.

q: Which is the odd one out: Lake, Sea, River, Pool, Pond?
desc: All except river have still water; river has flowing water.

q: Which is the odd one out: Arrow, Axe, Knife, Dagger, Sword?
desc: All except arrow are bladed weapons; arrow is a projectile.

q: Which is the odd one out: Sun, Moon, Star, Mars, Universe?
desc: All except universe are celestial bodies; universe is the whole cosmos.

q: Which is the odd one out: House, Cottage, School, Palace, Hut?
desc: All except school are types of dwellings; school is an institution.

q: Which is the odd one out: Turtle, Lamb, Bitch, Farrow, Colt?
desc: All except turtle are young ones of animals; turtle is an adult animal.

q: Which is the odd one out: Fox, Wolf, Jackal, Deer, Panther?
desc: All except deer are carnivorous animals; deer is herbivorous.

q: Which is the odd one out: Cap, Turban, Helmet, Veil, Hat?
desc: All except helmet are types of headwear for protection from weather; helmet is for safety.
